synopsis.text: Hyoudou Michiru, Utaha Kasumigaoka, Eriri Spencer Sawamura, Megumi Katou, and their high school otaku friend Tomoya Aki form a doujin circle called Blessing Software, working together to create a dating-simulation game. As they near completion, the team heads to the picturesque Japanese countryside to scout locations and take necessary photos. While illustrator Eriri and model Megumi stay focused on the task, the scriptwriter Utaha and music producer Michiru have other ideas, pulling Tomoya into a series of romantic and risqu√© situations. In this chaotic yet entertaining trip, Tomoya must navigate the attention of his four eccentric female teammates to ensure the successful completion of their project.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
